name: Holy Water
description: Water blessed for protection and devotion.

name: Scapular
description: Cloth sacramental worn as a sign of devotion.

name: Medal
description: Religious medals worn for faith and protection.

name: Crucifix
description: Cross with the body of Christ, central Christian symbol.

name: Candle
description: Candles blessed and used in prayer and liturgy.

name: Incense
description: Fragrant offering burned in liturgical ceremonies.

name: Oil
description: Blessed oil used in anointing and sacraments.

name: Palm
description: Palm branches blessed on Palm Sunday.
